name: Moondog's dog
description:
This is short 2d platformer rhythm game. Here I'm testing my idea about rhythm game, and I'm waiting for your feedback.

Game was created for Games of Symphonies. The rhythm was inspired by 
You Have To Have Hope - Moondog, like and main character:).

Woof Woof

Play time : 2 minutes.

Tutorial:

Move:  "a"/"d"  or "<-"/"->"

Jump: "Space"
